message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a starting price of $230. I'm confident it will be valuable to you. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that much for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value of this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $190?
I'm still not convinced it's worth that much to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $150
